Name: Movement-related artefacts (MR-ART) dataset
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the following publication describing the dataset: Nárai, Á., Hermann, P., Auer, T. et al. Movement-related artefacts (MR-ART) dataset of matched motion-corrupted and clean structural MRI brain scans. Sci Data 9, 630 (2022). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-022-01694-8
Funding: Hungarian National Research, Development and Innovation Office (GINOP-2.2.1-18-2018-00001)
EthicsApprovals: The research protocol used for collecting the dataset was approved by the National Institute of Pharmacy and Nutrition (file number: OGYÉI/70184/2017).
